Summary: Observed large object moving north from back porch.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bedford
There were no other sightings in Bedford on or around May 16th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsI was letting my dogs out the back door. I have never heard a rumble such asthat from any AC worked around AC for 37 years, 2 mos. 4 days. I knew I hadnever seen that before. I remained calm and called my wife to get out of bedand come and observe this object. It had the form of a bananna I could only seethe outline with a red light on the port tip and a green light on the starboardtip. It had about 300 to 400 little white lights filling the space between thered and green tip lights. The object moved slowly away 40-55 mph in a northerlydirection, with that strange rumbling sound.
